items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 150 check-ins with a photo.
Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 5 beers with an ABV between 5.1% and 9.9%. Try 5 more Level 3!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 10 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: Tastes like hoppy mash. Not a bad thing; I'm just more accustomed to dominate hops in an IIPA.

user.bio: Untappd's Henry Chinaski. Lover of (fem)ales & lil lagers. A super sour seeker forever finding fine funk from faraway.
